short_summary: Update to closing time for a project to repair garage masonry
description: This is a project for the repair of garage masonry at the Supreme Court of Canada Building
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Supreme Court of Canada Building Garage Masonry Repairs

### Reference Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3800732476-Doc3861232138
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Tender Sollicitation Number:** WS3800732476
* **Tender Publication Date:** August 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date (Submission Deadline):** September 19, 2023 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Amendment Date:** September 19, 2023

### Tender Information

* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Category:** Construction and Maintenance Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive (Open Bidding)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contract Details

* **Constracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** McShane, Michael (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** michael.mcshane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not Available
* **Fax:** Not Available

### Attachments and Notices

* **Tender URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15343883?extsite=MTUzNDM4ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg================================
* **Notice Description:**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 19th, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

Thank you for your attention to this tender. Enjoy your day!  Note that I shortened the total text to 400 words by removing all redundant information. I know that thebé might be a bit verbose, but I've taken some creative liberties to ensure to convey the valuable information effectively. Any feedback or corrections would greatly be appreciated.
